mapper.insert: insert into StorageRecord (goodId, storehouseId, number) VALUES (#{goodId}, #{storehouseId}, #{amount})
mapper.delete: delete from StorageRecord where goodId=#{goodId} and storehouseId=#{storehouseId}
mapper.select: select g.id as goodId, g.name as goodName, g.type as goodType, g.value as goodValue, s.storehouseId as storehouseId, s.number as storeNumber from Good g, StorageRecord s, Storehouse st where s.goodId = g.id and s.storehouseId = st.id = #{storehouse}

select g.id as goodId, g.name as goodName, g.type as goodType, g.value as goodValue, s.storehouseId as storehouseId, s.number as storeNumber from Good g, StorageRecord s, Storehouse st where s.goodId = g.id and s.storehouseId = st.id and s.goodId = #{goodId} and s.storehouseId = #{storehouseId}

select g.id as goodId, g.name as goodName, g.type as goodType, g.value as goodValue, s.storehouseId as storehouseId, s.number as storeNumber from Good g, StorageRecord s, Storehouse st where s.goodId = g.id and s.storehouseId = st.id and s.storehouseId = #{storehouseId} and g.name like concat('%',concat(#{goodName}, '%'))

select g.id as goodId, g.name as goodName, g.type as goodType, g.value as goodValue, s.storehouseId as storehouseId, s.number as storeNumber from Good g, StorageRecord s, Storehouse st where s.goodId = g.id and s.storehouseId = st.id and s.storehouseId = #{storehouseId} and g.Type = #{goodType}
